bibl.title: A Small Note on P. Oxy. XVI 2057.
bibl.note: In lines 6, 13, and 15 of P. Oxy. XVI, 2057 "kasid()" stands for kasid(ion) = (the diminutive of the Latin) cassis = helmet. "Ioannes Kere" (line 3) and "Petros Seei" (line 8) occur also in P. Oxy. XVI, 2045: it only follows from P. Oxy. XVI, 2057 that these "messengers" (summachoi) too had to supply shields.
Sijpesteijn Pieter Johannes, A Small Note on P. Oxy. XVI 2057.
